author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
DOOM: The Dark Ages | Hugo Martin's Game Director Playthrough - Ch. 14 - Resurrection

Join us as DOOM: The Dark Ages' Game Director Hugo Martin plays through a different level per week while providing his unique insights into the game’s design.

Our weekly DOOM Eternal Mods Spotlight featured:
A work in progress mod called "Remnant" by Saleem

Wave 1 of the id Signature Series Capsule collection is live! Made by the incredible concept art team at id and available for a very limited time from now until midnight on Oct 23rd!
https://gear.bethesda.net/collections/id-signature-series

For more information on all things DOOM: The Dark Ages and id Software, follow these channels and join the Slayers Club.  

Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/doom.com
Twitter: https://x.com/DOOM/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/doom/ 
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@doom
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DOOM
Website: https://doom.bethesda.net/
Slayers Club: https://slayersclub.bethesda.net/

ESRB R
title: Slayers Club Live | DOOM: The Dark Ages | Hugo Martin's Game Director Playthrough - Ch. 14

author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
This October is MachineGames’ 15-year anniversary and this update is our anniversary gift for all players of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™.

The update contains three main additions that have climbed high on the community’s wish list: New Game+, the iconic Cairo outfit, and voice language select.

Winner of over 80 awards and awarded D.I.C.E “Adventure Game of the Year”, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle delivers an immersive experience that allows you to step into the boots of the renowned archaeologist.


ESRB RATING: Teen with Violence, Blood and gore, Mild language, Drug reference
title: MachineGames Anniversary Update Trailer – Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™
